productName: Bi-Phase Eye-Makeup Remover with 1% Pea Peptides + Castor Oil
productShortDesc: This natural formula effectively removes even waterproof eye makeup. It is enriched with castor oil and peptides to strengthen lashes, and chamomile hydrolate to soothe the eye area. 99% naturally derived. Vegan. Made in France.
productIngredients:
Pea peptides:
Pea peptides are long chains of amino acids rich in lysine, and are known for their volumizing properties. They stimulate, strengthen and thicken lashes.
Chamomile extract:
Chamomile’s abundant flavonoids—natural antioxidant molecules—give it calming properties for soothing the delicate skin around the eyes.
Castor oil:
This plant oil has nourishing and strengthening properties and promotes lash growth.
Sweet almond oil:
Plant oil rich in fatty acids that nourishes lashes and calms the skin.
Rice bran oil:
Light, non-greasy plant oil. Helps to remove makeup while also moisturising and soothing the skin around the eyes.
